content.rendered:
Directed by Tushar Jalota

Star Abhishek Bachchan (Ganga Ram Chaudhary). Nimrat Kaur (Bimla Devi). Yami Gautam (Jyoti Deswal). Manu Rishi Chadha (Satpal Tomar). Chittaranjan Tripathy (Tandon). Danish Husain (Rai Bareli). Arun Kushwah (Ghanti). Shivankit Singh Parihar (Kavish). Rohit Tiwari (Imaandar). Dhanveer Singh (Atul). Sachin Shroff (Sandeep Sangwan). Aditi Vats (Bimla Devi’s Manager). Lokesh Mittal (Sherawat). Shrikant Verma (Doctor). Prem Jhangiani (Judge Tripathi)

Written by Sandeep Leyzell .Suresh Nair .Ritesh Shah

Language Hindi

Producers Sankalp Acharekar. Kushagra Kulshrestha. Sandeep Leyzell. Ashish Nikam. Yogiraj Shetty. Shraddha Singh. Dinesh Vijan. Shobhna Yadav

Production Bake My Cake Films. Jio Studios. Maddock Films
